history.content:
Are you interested in technology, consulting, product management, design, or all of the above? DiversaTech is the premier student-run tech consulting organization at UC Berkeley, where we form interdisciplinary teams of students to deliver innovative and practical recommendations for our clients, ranging from startups like Affirm and Jumpstart, to bigger tech companies such as Google and LinkedIn. We accept people of all majors and strongly encourage underrepresented minorities and transfer students to apply! No prior technical or consulting experience is required.

Apply here: https://lnkd.in/gQmhjid
Deadline: Friday, September 11th, 1PM PST

Coffee Chats
Get to know our consultants, project managers, executives, and senior advisors in 15-minute coffee chats! Time slots run from Monday, August 31st thru Sunday, September 6th.
Sign up for a time slot at https://lnkd.in/gQ4RrGT.

Infosession 1
We will present our team and the consulting projects lined up for this semester, followed by a networking session.
Tuesday, September 8th, 8PM – 10PM PST
Zoom link: https://lnkd.in/gnntHQP

URM Infosession
This event is catered towards underrepresented racial minorities (URM), including but not limited to students of Black/African American/Caribbean/West Indies and Hispanic/Latinx descent, as well as transfer students.
Thursday, September 10th, 8PM – 10PM PST
Zoom link: https://lnkd.in/gnntHQP

Infosession 2
If you were unable to attend the first infosession, no worries! Join us at our second infosession on Thursday for the same experience.
Thursday, September 10th, 8PM – 10PM PST
Zoom link: https://lnkd.in/gnntHQP

Hope to see you there!
history.subject: DiversaTech Consulting Fall 2020 Recruitment
